title.native: Übel Blatt～ユーベルブラット～

description:
Rumors stir throughout the land: when the wielder of the black sword draws his dark blade, all who stand in its path are torn asunder…!

Köinzell, the mysterious young boy who carries the black sword, undeniably wields it with exceptional skill, but can he truly be responsible for the bloody rumors? Pursued by the Traitorous Lances, four powerful warriors who were thought to have been defeated by the Seven Heroes, the strength of the young swordsman will be tested to its limit. At battle’s end, only the shocking truth of Köinzell’s quest will stand above the corpses of his enemies…

An epic fantasy on the grandest of scales!

(Source: Yen Press)

tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Medieval

title.native: Übel Blatt ～ユーベルブラット～

name.native: エルサリア・ランクレーブ
アト・クシャールンド

node.description:
Former adult game scenario writer. He is a creator of cult classic Shizuku, Kizuato and To Heart.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_takahasi)

[Website](https://www.garnidelia.com) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAYfguaShVaNDU561_jJoOQ) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/garnidelia)

__Members:__ female vocalist [MARiA](https://anilist.co/staff/102307/Mai-Mizuhashi) (Mai Mizuhashi), composer [toku](https://anilist.co/staff/160034/Yoshinori-Abe) (Abe Yoshinori)

The duo first collaborated on the song "Color," which was used as the opening theme to the 2010 anime _Freezing_. The name of their unit came from the French phrase "Le Palais Garnier de Maria" (Maria's Opera), and the asteroid Cordelia, which was discovered in 1978, the year of Toku's birth.

In 2014, they made their debut under major record label Defstar Records with the single "ambiguous," which was released on March 5, 2014. Its title track was used as the second opening theme to the 2013 anime _Kill la Kill_.

Former adult game scenario writer. He is a creator of cult classic Shizuku, Kizuato and To Heart.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_takahasi)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/soft_okuda) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/奥田維城)

Affiliated with Swara Pro.
